question.text:
Match Column I with Column II and select the correct option.
 
  Column I   Column II
A AIDS p Yersinia pestis
B Syphilis q Hepatitis virus
C Viral jaundice r HIV
D Gonorrhea s Treponema
    t Neisseria

options.text: <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text: AIDS is acquired immune deficiency syndrome and is caused by human immune deficiency virus. Syphilis is caused by bacteria Treponema pallidum. Jaundice is an infection of the Liver and is caused by the Hepatitis virus. Gonorrhea also known as 'clap' is caused by Neisseria gonorrhoeae.
